ygData.subject: Re: spell slots
ygData.msgSnippet: i can tell you why i dont use tashan. i am lvl 17 and it has worked for me 50 percent of the time. the only MOBs that i need to cast it on are red or yellow,
ygData.messageBody:
i can tell you why i dont use tashan. i am lvl 17 and it has worked for me
50 percent of the time. the only MOBs that i need to cast it on are red or
yellow, and it doesnt work enough for me to justify wasting the mana for it.

as an aside- i was in unrest with some people yesterday, and a red dark or
dry bone (cant remember which) got pulled, and it only resisted 1 of the 6
spells i chucked at it... i cant egin tosay how much i hate it when some
reds resist all, and some dont... =)

oh yeah, my list(solo/group):

root/root
gate/languid pace
strengthen/strengthen
mist/rune 1
choke/choke
santiy warp/sanity warp
lesser sheilding/ebbing strength
chaotic feedback/quickness

i typically am a buffer when i group, and when i solo i go all out (i also
make pet only when i solo, shalee's animation wooooo- it can solo crocs in
oasis as well as shriveled mummies and dervs in Ro).

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 17th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

>
>Why the decision not to use Tashan?
>
>

-------------------
tim borrelli
computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
